attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pull troops out of the hell hole that is iraq! being an ex serving soldier i too have spent time there, nothing happened then, 4 years on nothing is happening now. It seems were only scared of America if we do anything without asking for their permission. Innocent lives of soldiers and their families pain can be felt throughout the whole uk. Nothing will be be sorted there, the only best idea is to leave the country to sort themselves out, as their bringing in new weapons and ammunitions ie: shaped charges, which damaged our Challenger 2 tank which is the British Armys best weapon, if they can damage that then who knows what they will do next.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
